mapper.select:
SELECT t1.id as creUserId, t1.user_phone, t2.name as custName, t4.company_name, t1.create_time, t5.account, t1.user_type, t2.id, t4.id as agentId FROM o_agent_cre_user t3 LEFT JOIN o_agent t4 ON t3.agent_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN cre_user t1 ON t3.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN businesslicenceinfo t2 ON t2.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cre_user_account t5 ON t5.cre_user_id = t1.id
LEFT JOIN o_agent_sys_user t6 on t6.agent_id=t4.id LEFT JOIN o_sys_user t7 on t7.user_id=t6.sys_user_id
WHERE t4.id is not null
and t7.user_id=#{sysUserId}
and t1.user_type = 1
and t1.create_time >= #{startTimeStr}
and t1.create_time < #{endTimeStr}
and t4.company_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and t2.name like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
and t1.user_phone like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT t1.id as creUserId, t1.user_phone, t2.username as custName, t4.company_name, t1.create_time, t5.account, t1.user_type, t2.id, t4.id as agentId FROM o_agent_cre_user t3 LEFT JOIN o_agent t4 ON t3.agent_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN cre_user t1 ON t3.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN idcardinfo t2 ON t2.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cre_user_account t5 ON t5.cre_user_id = t1.id
LEFT JOIN o_agent_sys_user t6 on t6.agent_id=t4.id LEFT JOIN o_sys_user t7 on t7.user_id=t6.sys_user_id
WHERE t4.id is not null
and t7.user_id=#{sysUserId}
and t1.user_type = 0
and t1.create_time >= #{startTimeStr}
and t1.create_time < #{endTimeStr}
and t4.company_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and t2.username like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
and t1.user_phone like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT t1.id as creUserId, t1.user_phone, t2.username as custName, t4.company_name, t1.create_time, t5.account, t1.user_type, t2.id, t4.id as agentId FROM o_agent_cre_user t3 LEFT JOIN o_agent t4 ON t3.agent_id = t4.id LEFT JOIN cre_user t1 ON t3.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN idcardinfo t2 ON t2.cre_user_id = t1.id LEFT JOIN cre_user_account t5 ON t5.cre_user_id = t1.id
LEFT JOIN o_agent_sys_user t6 on t6.agent_id=t4.id LEFT JOIN o_sys_user t7 on t7.user_id=t6.sys_user_id
WHERE t4.id is not null
and t7.user_id=#{sysUserId}
and t1.user_type is null
and t1.create_time >= #{startTimeStr}
and t1.create_time < #{endTimeStr}
and t4.company_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and t2.username like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
and t1.user_phone like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
order by t1.create_time desc

SELECT t1.id AS creUserId, t1.user_phone, eu.userName custName, CASE WHEN t1.user_type = 1 THEN '企业' WHEN t1.user_type = 0 THEN '个人' ELSE "" END userType, t1.create_time, t1.user_type, t3.agent_id AS agentId, o.company_name FROM o_agent o INNER JOIN o_agent_cre_user t3 on t3.agent_id = o.id
and t3.agent_id=#{agentId}
LEFT join erp_user_info e on e.creUserId = t3.cre_user_id LEFT JOIN erp_user eu on eu.userId = e.companyName INNER JOIN cre_user t1 ON t3.cre_user_id = t1.id
and t1.user_type = 0
and t1.user_type = 1
and t1.user_type is null
and t1.create_time >= #{startTimeStr}
and t1.create_time < DATE_ADD(#{endTimeStr},INTERVAL 1 day)
and t1.user_phone like concat('%',#{mobile},'%')
WHERE o.`status` = 1 and o.delete_flag = 1
and o.company_name like concat('%',#{agentName},'%')
and eu.userName like concat('%',#{custName},'%')
order by t1.create_time desc
